Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.9GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Corresponding to OpenGL
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Corresponding to OpenGL
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: D3DX9_39.dll (DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)) is required.
